cs.ualberta.ca.tunein.network

Class ElasticSearchOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.tunein.network.ElasticSearchOperations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElasticSearchOperationsInterface

    public class ElasticSearchOperations
extends Object
implements ElasticSearchOperationsInterface
    Handles sending Coments to the server and executing searches on the server. Most of the code in this class is based on: https://github.com/rayzhangcl/ESDemo

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getCommentPosts(String elasticID, Comment model, Context cntxt)
      Searches the server for Comments

      Gets the profile from the server.
      void getRepliesByParentId(String parentID, Comment model, Context cntxt, ReplyViewAdapter adap)
      Searches the server for Comment replies corresponding to parent id.
      void getReplyReplies(Comment model, String parentID, Context cntxt) 
      void getTopicsBySort(ThreadList modelList, Context cntxt, String sort)
      Method to get comments from elasticsearch and sort them based on the specified sort option in the parameters, either: hotness(default), date, picture, my location, set location Code from: http://www.elasticsearch.org/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-request-sort.html
      void postCommentModel(Comment model)
      Sends a Comment to the server.
      void postProfileModel(Commenter model)
      Sends a commenter profile to the server.
      void putCommentModel(Comment model)
      Method used for updating a comment on elasticsearch by posting using the elastic id.
      void putProfileModel(Commenter model)
      Updates a profile to the server.

      • getTopicsBySort

        public void getTopicsBySort(ThreadList modelList,
                   Context cntxt,
                   String sort)
        Description copied from interface: ElasticSearchOperationsInterface
        Method to get comments from elasticsearch and sort them based on the specified sort option in the parameters, either: hotness(default), date, picture, my location, set location Code from: http://www.elasticsearch.org/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-request-sort.html
        Specified by:
        getTopicsBySort in interface ElasticSearchOperationsInterface
        Parameters:
        modelList - ThreadList that will be filled.
